body:
In preparation for tomorrow for you US folk... I've rolled out a lobby that showcases a new design. You spawn with flowers, armor, and the lobby itself is a different biome (along with some girly favorites, like diamonds and pretty pink sky!)

Though it's a bit rough and messy, regardless I wanted to roll out a little surprise that hopefully would be liked. When the lobbies restart the things should appear, keep in mind it'll only last 1 day. Any suggestions would be great.

Yes... it's messy with the block combinations. Not sure of real girly favorites either, I've never a girlfriend =(

title: [NEW] Mother's Day Lobby!

replies.body: Gah... it looks like Dr. Seuss threw up and became a mapdev.
